news.title: Elon Musk says people against his DOGE cuts are trying to pressure Tesla to get him to stop
news.summary: Shares of Tesla entered Monday down more than 34% year to date. The stock has been cut nearly in half from its peak in December.

news.title: First-quarter GDP growth will be just 0.3% as tariffs stoke stagflation conditions, says CNBC survey
news.summary: The Rapid Update, averaging forecasts from 14 economists for GDP and inflation, sees first quarter growth registering an anemic 0.3%. The first quarter of 2014 is expected to see growth of just 0.2%.

news.title: France's Marine Le Pen barred from running for public office for 5 years after embezzlement conviction: Media
news.summary: Marine Le Pen found guilty of misappropriating EU funds in historic trial. Le Pen's conviction could halt her future presidential election hopes.

news.title: Aston Martin shares pop as Canadian billionaire Lawrence Stroll invests more cash
news.summary: Stroll's stake in the company is poised to increase to roughly 33% from about 27.7% as part of the transaction.

news.title: These nuclear companies are leading the race to build advanced small reactors in the U.S.
news.summary: Leading players have significant financial backing already lined up, often from technology companies and future customers. Many of these companies are based in London or New York, with some in Silicon Valley.
